Title: Ten years of the U.N. International women -- Equality, Development, Peace -- Create a beautiful tomorrow for the nation
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The Third World Conference on Women took place in Nairobi, Kenya, in 1985. Its goal was to appraise the achievements of the UN Decade for Women (1976-1985). The Fourth World Conference on Women took place in Beijing in 1995.
